name: SCHWEIGER DERMATOLOGY GROUP
sampleDescriptions: Corporatization and Consolidation in Health Care; Private Equity, Medicare Reimbursement; Dermatology Research Issues.
Corporatization and Consolidation in Health Care; Private Equity, Medicare Reimbursement; Dermatology Research Issues.
Medicare reimbursement, including the Medicare Physician Fee Schedule. Healthcare consolidation, including the Health Over Wealth Act (draft legislation).
